K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-5: rig pa'i bdag po nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-6: byang chub kyi lam sna tshogs bsags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-7: thar ba'i dam pa la zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-8: sku la byang chub kyi lam bsags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-9: yi dvags yongs su thar bar mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-10: ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab lta bu brgya stong dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes de ltar gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyad par dam pa'i bstod pas bstod nas; slar yang gshin rje'i rgyal pos lan gsum bskor te de nyid nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mchi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-16: de ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po nas byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-17: yi dvags kyi grong khyer du song nas mgal shing lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-19: bdag gi skra dang spus g-yogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323a-21: kha khab kyi mig lta bu'i yi dvags brgya stong du ma mdun nas rgyug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @323b chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nam yi dvags kyi grong khyer du song ba de'i tshe yi dvags kyi grong khyer de bsil bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-1: rdo rje'i ser ba de'ang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-2: sgo ba de'ang byin pa thag thug can la mig dmar zhing lag na 'khar ba thogs pa las kyi sa 'di 'dra ba ni bdag gi bya ba ma yin no zhes byams pa'i sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i phyag gi sor mo bcu las chu bo chen po bcu byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-4: zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las chu bo chen po bcu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-5: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po shin tu thugs brtse ba'i zil gyis non nas ba spu'i khung bu nas chu bo byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-6: gang gi tshe na de dag gis chu myong ba de'i tshe de dag mgrin pa yangs par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-7: lus kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-8: lha'i zas ro'i nang na ro mchog tu byung ba dang ldan pas tshim par gyur nas de'i tshe 'khor ba'i bsam pa la sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-10: dzambu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni grib ma bsil ba la yongs su bsten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-11: gang dzambu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni rtag tu pha ma la yongs su 'dzin cing bsnyen bkur byed de bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:323b-12: gang rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten cing skyong ba'i skyes bu de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-0: gang rtag tu theg pa chen po rtag tu khong du chud par @324a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-1: byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni bsam pa dang ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-2: gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byed pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o; ;gang chos kyi gandi brdung pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-3: gang gtsug lag khang gas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-4: gogs pa rnams slar 'chos pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-5: gang sngon gyi mchod rten gyi gzugs gas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-6: gogs pa rnams slar 'chos pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-7: gang chos smra ba dang bsten pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-8: gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag pa mthong ba de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-9: gang rang sangs rgyas 'chag pa mthong ba de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-10: gang byang chub sems dpa' 'chag pa mthong ba de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o zhes de ltar lus kyi rjes su sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-11: de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i mdo za ma tog bkod pa dkon mchog gi rgyal po'i sgra byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-12: de'i tshe de dag gi 'jigs tshogs la lta pa'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas de dag thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324a-13: byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i bzhin zhes bya bar skyes nas gang gi tshe des sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de'i tshe slar yang song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das @324b la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mchi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-5: nyi ma re re'ang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yongs su smin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-7: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spobs pa de 'dra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-8: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhag mthong zhes bya ba rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-14: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-15: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-16: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-18: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-19: nga ni spos kyi bzhin zhes bya ba'i tshong pa'i bur gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:324b-20: de'i tshe ngas de bzhin gshegs pa lhag mthong las spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub @325a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-1: sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa ji skad du gsan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-4: mig las ni nyi ma dang zla ba byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-5: dpral ba las ni dbang phyug chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-6: phrag pa las ni tshangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-7: snying las ni mthu bo che /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-8: mche ba gnyis las ni lha mo dbyangs can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-9: kha nas ni rlung rnams byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-11: lto ba las ni chu'i lha byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-12: gang gi tshe spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i lus las lha de dag byung ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-13: dbang phyug chen po khyod dus ngan pa'i tshe sems can gyi khams ma rungs pa dag byung ba na khyod thog mar byed pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-14: gtong ba po'i lhar grags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-15: sems can de dag ni byang chub kyi lam yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-16: so so'i skye bo'i nang du gtam byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-17: nam mkha' ni de'i rtags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-19: sems can thams cad kyi ni gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-20: zhu bar 'gyur bas na rtags so zhes zer bar 'gyur ro zhes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325a-22: ngas de bzhin gshegs pa lhag mthong las de skad thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-0: de 'das nas de bzhin gshegs @325b pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug ldan zhes bya ba rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-3: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-4: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba nga ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin la dpa' ba zhes bya bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-6: de las kyang ngas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa ji skad du gsan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-19: mi thams cad 'dus par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:325b-20: gang gi tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa chen po gzigs nas 'khor de'i nang du chos kyi gtam bya bar brtsams pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer gyi kha dog sna tshogs byung ba sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-4: dngul gyi kha dog rnams byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-5: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas slar 'ongs te bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-6: de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-7: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-8: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-9: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-10: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ltas 'di lta bu bstan par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-14: de 'ong ba'i tshe ltas 'di 'dra ba ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-15: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'ong ba de'i tshe shing dpag bsam rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-17: shing kunda'i me tog kyang 'byung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-19: rdzing bu me tog gis shin tu gang ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326a-20: de las rin po che'i shing rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-0: char sna tshogs kyang @326b 'bab par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-7: byu ru rin po che'i char yang 'bab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-8: lha'i gos kyi char yang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-9: lha gang de dang nye ba nyid du rin po che bdun yang 'byung ba 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-11: bal glang rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-13: nor bu rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-14: bud med rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-15: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-16: blon po rin po che bdun rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-17: de dag byung nas sa gser du snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-18: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas byung ba de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-24: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-25: de'i ltas 'di 'dra ba dag byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-26: gang gi tshe na bskyod pa de'i tshe yid dga' ba'i me tog padma'i char rab tu bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:326b-27: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos me tog padma 'dab ma stong pa sdong bu gser du snang ba thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-1: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas me tog 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyis bskur to zhes padma phul te bsnyung ba ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-4: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang gsung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-5: des padma de blangs te g-yon phyogs su bzhag nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-6: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i las kyi sa ji lta bur bsgrubs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-7: sems can yi dvags dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-8: bstir med par skyes pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-9: thig nag po can dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-11: ha ha zhes 'bod pa thams cad dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-12: gdung ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-13: sdong du ma lta bu'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-14: me'i bum pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-15: sems can dmyal ba chen po sham pa la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-16: sems can dmyal ba chen po chu grang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-17: sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa dag ni bdag gi las kyi sa te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-18: bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327a-19: bgyis nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @327b spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos dri ba'i lan btab nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-2: song nas me'i phung po 'bar ba bzhin du sa dang nam mkha' la mi snang bar song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-5: zhu ba lung bstan pa bshad pa bdag zhu na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la lha'i bskal par na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-10: na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-11: yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-12: gang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bsod nams 'phel bar gyur pa'i bsod nams de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ba spu gcig gi rtse mo la gnas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:327b-16: gling chen po bzhir zla ba bcu gnyis kyi lor nyin mtshan du char pa bab kyang thigs pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-1: dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-5: rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-6: zheng du dpag tu med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-7: rta rgod ma'i kha lta bu'i mthar thug pa'i thigs pa re re nas ngas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-13: gling chen po bzhin seng ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-17: ri dvags la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-23: byi la la sogs pa rkang pa bzhi pa de dag gi spu re re nas ni ngas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328a-29: rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs lha'i gser rin po che las byas nas nyin gcig bzhin du ring bsrel bcug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-0: de'i bsod nams @328b kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-5: shing shri sha ba'i tshal gyi lo ma ni ngas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-10: gling chen po bzhin gnas pa'i bud med dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-13: bu mo gnas pa de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-14: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-17: rang byang chub la bkod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-18: gang de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni snga ma bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ba sbu'i rtse mo'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:328b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-0: bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci 'dra ba de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang gang na'ang ma mthong ma thos nas byang chub sems dpar gyur pa lta @329a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-4: gang nga 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams su gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-5: de dag kyang gnas gcig tu gzhog cing na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-8: na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-9: yo byad rnams kyis bskal par gzhog kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi phung po bgrang mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-11: nga gcig pu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pas lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-12: gang 'jig rten na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ming dran pa de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-13: de dag ni rga ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-16: sdug bsngal ba las yongs su thar ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-17: de dag ni 'khor ba'i tha ma gzhan med pa'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329a-18: de dag ni gos dkar po dang skya bo bzhin du bya ngang pa'i rgyal po mgyogs pa dang rlung gi shugs 'ong ba bzhin du bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas las chos mngon du nyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-0: thos nas kyang de dag gi lus la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi @329b 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-6: de dag gi lus la bkres par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-7: mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal ba shes par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-8: chos kyi ros bskyed nas de nyid du padma'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yi dam brtan po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-10: sems can thams cad thar pa la bzhag gi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtag tu 'dzin cing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-13: gang gi dus na yi dam brtan pa de yongs su rdzogs pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-15: sems can mang po 'khor pa na 'khor ba'i sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-16: byang chub kyi lam ston par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-17: gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-18: de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:329b-19: rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-1: can rnams la ni dgra bcom pa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-2: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-3: dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-4: mthu bo ches 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni mthu bo che'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-5: tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-6: dbang pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dbang po'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-7: nyi mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-8: zla bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni zla ba'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-9: me lhas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni me lha'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-10: chu lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni chu lha'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-11: rlung gi lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni rlung lha'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330a-12: klus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni klu'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-0: bgegs med pa'i bdag pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni bgegs med pa'i bdag po'i gzugs @330b kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-1: gnod sbyin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-2: ngal bso po'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni ngal bso po'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-3: rgyal po'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni rgyal po'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-4: mkhas pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni mkhas pa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-5: rgyal po'i mis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni rgyal po'i mi'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-6: pha dang mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni pha dang ma'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-7: sems can dag ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba de lta de ltar chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni de ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-12: bdag ni shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:330b-13: bdag ni nam yang 'di 'dra ba'i yul mthong ba'am thos par ma gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yul ji 'dra ba de 'dra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang ma mchis @331a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-1: so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-3: dzambu'i gling 'di nyid na rdo rje'i mngal zhes bya ba'i phug yod pa de na lha ma yin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-4: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po lha ma yin rnams la lha ma yin gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-5: theg pa chen po'i mdo rin po che'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'di nyid 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-7: gang lha ma yin gzhan pa de dag kyang byams pa'i sems dang zhi ba'i sems su byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-8: lag pa'i thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-9: gang 'jig rten na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di lta bu mngon du byed pa de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-10: thos nas kyang mtshams med pa lnga dag zad par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-11: 'chi ba'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bcu gnyis gshegs nas rigs kyi bu ma 'jigs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-12: khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-13: bde ba can du 'gro ba'i phyir lam sna tshogs kyang sta gon byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331a-17: se mo do rnams kyang sta gon byas so zhes dbugs 'byin par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-0: ltas de @331b lta bu 'byung zhing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bar chad med par bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de ni lha ma yin rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ston par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te de nyid nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-5: de'ang 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-8: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-9: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob pa zhes bya sngon byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-12: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-13: nga ni mi mi rgyu ba'i sa'i phyogs ri khrod kyi bar ri brags shig na gnas shing bzod pa smra bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-14: de'i tshe dus dus su ngas de bzhin gshegs pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:331b-16: gser gyis la song nas sems can spyi'u tshugs su 'dug pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i lam mya ngan las 'da' ba ston par byed pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-1: nas gser gyi sa las byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-2: dngul gyi sa la song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-3: de na skyes bu gang zag rkang pa bzhi yod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyed cag bsam pa dam pa rab kyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgyags kyi rjes su sems shing mngon du phyogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyon cig ces chos 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-4: de nas skyes bu de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-5: sems can long ba rnams la ni lam ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-6: mgon ma mchis pa rnams la ni mgon dang skyabs mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-7: pha dang ma ma mchis pa rnams la ni pha dang ma mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-8: ngan song gsum gyi mun pa la ni sgron med mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-9: tshor bar bgyid pa'i thar pa'i lam ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-10: sems can gang dag rtag tu khyod kyi mtshan rjes su dran zhing yongs su len pa de dag ni bde bar ldan pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-11: bdag cag myong ba lta bu sdug bsngal las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-12: de nas sems can de dag gi rna ba'i bu gar theg pa chen po'i mdo sde za ma tog bkod pa'i sgra byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332a-13: skyes bu de dag gis de thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bsgrub cing shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-0: bam po gnyis @332b pa; de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byung nas sa gzhan lcags las byas par song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-1: gang du lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gtor ma zhes bya ba mchis pa der song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-2: de nas lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gtor mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong nas slas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-4: lha ma yin sgur po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-5: thung du la sogs pa du ma dang 'grogs shing 'khor dang bcas te dong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa la phyag btsal te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-7: de ring du ni bdag gi tshe'i 'bras bu mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-8: de ring du ni bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-9: de ring du ni bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-10: gang bdag gis khyod yang dag par mthong bas de'i tshe lus thams cad bde ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la rin po che'i khri phul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-14: gzhan gyi chung ma la chags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-15: srog gcod pa la brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-16: pha rol gyi srog gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-17: rga ba dang 'chi bas 'jigs pa rnams la thugs rjes gzigs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:332b-18: 'khor bas skyo ba rnams la skyabs mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-1: ni pha dang mar gyur pa lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-2: bdag cag bcing bas bcings pa rnams la la ma ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-6: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms 'bul ba de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po 'di bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-10: nga dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bcu gnyis yod par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-11: de dag kyang gnas gcig tu bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis lha'i bskal par gnas su bcug na de dag gis kyang bsod nams kyi phung po de bgrang bar mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-12: nga gcig pu lha ma yin gyi gnas na gnas pas lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-16: rdul phra rab kyi tshad ni ngas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-18: bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-22: rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po'i thigs pa ni ngas re re nas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-24: bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams gyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333a-28: gling chen po bzhi pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-0: bu mo de dag thams cad nam gyi las @333b la brtson par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-1: gling chen po bzhi pa'i mi de dag rnams gzhan ni mi byed kyi yungs kar 'ba' zhig byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-2: dus dus su klu'i rgyal pos kyang char pa'i rgyun phab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-3: yungs kar de dag kyang legs par grub nas g-yul gcig tu byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-7: bu mo de dag thams cad kyis khur shing rta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-9: skon pa dang; rnga mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-12: de dag thams cad la bkal te g-yul chen po der spungs nas bong bu dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-13: ba lang dag gis bcags te phung po chen por byas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-15: de ni ngas 'bru re re nas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-17: bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-20: dper na; ri rab lhun po dpag tshad brgya khri bzhi stong 'og tu nub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-21: 'phang gi srid du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa de ni rigs kyi bu gro ga'i phung por gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-22: rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po ni snag tshas yongs su gang bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-23: gling bzhi na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-26: bu mo de dag thams cad ni yi ge bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-27: ri rab lhun po dang mnyam pa mtha' yas mu med pa yi ger bris kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:333b-29: yi ger de re re nas ngas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-0: bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de ni bgrang mi @334a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-5: yi ge pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-6: gang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de'ang de tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-10: rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi bye ma ni bye ma re re nas ngas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-12: bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-13: de nas lha ma yin gtor ma ma chi ma dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-14: ngom zung gnag dbugs kyis brnangs shing skad ngar por gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-15: shugs 'byin cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-17: 'khor dang bcas pas sbyin pa ji lta bu zhig bgyis nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-18: tshe 'di nyid la bcings pa thob par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-19: bdag gis zhing ngan pa la sbyin pa byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-20: las de'i 'bras bu myong ba 'di lags pa lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-21: thams cad mkhyen pa'i zhing la ni thal ba spar ba gang gtor kyang bdud rtsi 'grub par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334a-22: bdag gis ma 'tshal bas mchod sbyin mchod pa'i tshe mi'u thung gi gzugs kyis slong ba mchis nas bdag gis bal glang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-0: cod pan @334b dang; rna cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-1: se mo do mang po dang ldan pa ni bshams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-2: g-yag rnga'i rdul yab rin po ches spras pa ni dpyangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-3: mu tig gis se mo do dag dang mu tig las bgyis pa'i mjug ma dag ni mu tig gi dra ba dag gis g-yogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-4: gser gyi dril bu dag ni dngul gyis brgyus te sgra sil sil mchi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-5: gzhan yang glang ser skya stong dag rmig pa ni dngul las bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-6: rva ni gser las bgyis shing mu tig gi dra bas g-yogs te mchi ba de 'dra ba'i glang ser skya dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-7: gzhan yang bud med gzhon nu shin tu kha dog bzang zhing sha rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-8: shin tu sdug pa lha'i bu mo dang 'dra zhing 'gran pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-12: se mo de mang po thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-15: rkang pa'i gdu bu dang; rked pa'i ska rags kyi rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-18: mthe bo g-yon pa sor gdub dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-19: sgra sil sil mchi ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-20: gos tshon sna tshogs su btsos pa gyon pa stong dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-21: gzhan yang rin po che'i khri'u brgya stong dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-24: rin po che'i phung po du ma dag ni bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-25: gos dang rgyan gyi phung po du ma dag ni bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-26: ba lang gi rigs brgya stong du ma rdzi dang ldan pa dag ni sta gon bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:334b-27: zas dang skom mang po dag ni bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-0: lha'i zas ro'i ro mchog dang ldan @335a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-1: pa dag ni sta gon bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-2: gser dang dngul gyi dril bu rin po ches spras pa dag ni rtag tu bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-3: gser dang dngul gyis seng ge'i khri'u du ma dag ni rin po ches spras /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-4: lha'i g-yag rnga'i rdul yab kyi rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-6: lha ma dag ni gser gyis brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-7: gser gyi cod pan stong phrag du ma dag ni rin po ches brgyan cing bzhag pa dang; de'i tshe rgyal po ni stong tshogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-9: rgyal rigs ni 'bum phrag du ma tshogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-10: de'i tshe bdag gis sa'i gdugs gcig tu bgyis pa bdag ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-11: de bas na thog ma'i sdig pa mthol lo bshags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-12: rgyal rigs kyi chung ma rnams ni snying gar dral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-13: khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu dag srog bcad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-14: rgyal rigs chen po dag thams cad ni khu sgo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-15: lcags kyis bcings nas zangs kyi brag phug tu khrid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-16: rgyal rigs 'bum phrag du ma ni zangs kyi brag phug der stsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-17: kha sha dang pan da pa la sogs pa'i rgyal rigs de dag ni lcags thag lcags kyi phur pa dang ldan pas rkang lag bcings nas phug der bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-18: de'i tshe bdag gis chab sgo thams cad kyang bkum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-19: dang po ni shing gi sgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-20: gnyis pa ni seng ldeng gi sgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-22: bzhi pa ni zangs kyi sgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335a-23: lnga pa ni lcags kyi sgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-0: @335b drug pa ni dngul gyi sgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-1: bdun pa ni gser gyi sgo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-2: gser gyi sgo der ri bdun gcig gi steng du gcig brtsegs te bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-3: de nas bdag gis shing rta bcu pa'i bu 'tshol zhing gdugs la la la ni sbrang bu'i gzugs kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-4: gdugs la la la ni bung ba'i gzugs kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-5: gdugs la la la ni phag gi gzugs kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-6: gdugs la la la ni mi'i gzugs kyis de ltar bsgyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-7: gdugs re re zhing gzhan dang gzhan gyi gzugs kyis mchi'ang mngon du ma mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-8: de'i tshe bdag gis rjes su bsams te mchod sbyin bgyi bar brtsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-9: de'i tshe shing rta bcu pa'i bu glags 'tshol ba mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-10: des ri bdun dral cing gshegs nas myur du phyogs gzhan du bor te rgyal rigs de dag la skad cher smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-11: rgyal po de dag gis sgra de thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-12: thos nas dbugs phyin par gyur te gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-13: khyed cag gson nam shi zhes smras pa dang; de dag gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-14: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gson no zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-15: de nas skyes bu dpa' bo chen po des sgo de dag thams cad bcom nas zangs kyi phug de dag mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:335b-16: rgyal po bcings pa de dag thams cad kyis mthu bo che mthong nas yang na ni lha ma yin gtor ma shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-1: cag bsad pa'i dus la bab pa lta zhig ces phan tshun du sems pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-2: de nas de dag gis bdag cag ni g-yul gyi sar shi na legs kyi bcing bas bcings bzhin du shi na ma legs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-3: bdag cag ni bcing bas bcings bzhin du shi ba'i dus byas par gyur na rgyal rigs kyi chos kyang med par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-4: g-yul gyi sar shi ba'i dus byas na ni bdag cag mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gcig la gcig de skad smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-5: de nas rgyal po chen po de dag thams cad bdag bdag gi khab tu dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-6: shing rta 'dren pa'i rta du ma sta gon bgyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-7: gang gi tshe na de dag gis shing rta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-8: mtshon cha rin po che chen po dag sta gon bgyis pa de'i tshe shing rta bcu pa'i bu mi'u thung gi gzugs su sprul nas ri dvags kyi phags pa se ral du thogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-10: khri'u 'tshal te bdag gis drung du mchis nas chab sgor phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-11: sgo bas bram ze mi'u thung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-13: des bdag ni shul ring po nas mchis so zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-14: de nas sgo bas de la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-16: sa gang nas 'ongs zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-17: bdag ni zla ba'i gling nas rgyal po drang srong gi drung du mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336a-18: de nas skyes bu sgo ba de song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-0: gtor ma la lha khyod kyi zhal sngar @336b bram ze mi'u thung zhig mchis so zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-1: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor mas ci'i dngos po zhig slong zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-4: de nas rgyal po gtor mas khyod song la bram ze de khrid de shog cig ces de skad smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-5: sgo ba des de bos te bram ze chen po bzhud cig ces smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-6: de nang du song ba dang rin po che'i khri'u la bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-7: pa ba sangs kyang de'i tshe na de na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-8: de'ang de'i mkhan por grags nas des gtor ma la 'di ni dus kyi skyes bu 'dra ba zhig phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-9: khyod la nges par bar chad byed do zhes de skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-12: ngas ni ltas dang mtshan ma las shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-13: bdag cag gi thabs ji lta bu zhig bgyi; de nas mthu bo ches nges par sbyin pa la 'gyod par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas des de'i khar sa ra sva ti bcug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-17: bram ze des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-18: gom pa gnyis shig gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-19: bram ze chen po khyod kyis ji ltar gom pa gnyis blangs na ngas ni gom pa gsum sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-20: de nas blang ba blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-21: bkra shis so zhes smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:336b-22: des chu dang til dang gser du bcas pa blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-0: de nas mi'u thung de'i gzugs @337a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-2: de nas pa ba sangs des 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-3: rgyal po'i drang srong kho bos dus kyi skyes bu 'ongs so zhes byas na khyod kyis nga'i tshig ma mnyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-4: las de'i 'bras bu myong bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-5: des bdag gi lus chen por bsgyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-6: nyi ma dang zla ba ni de'i phrag pa la gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-7: lag na ni ral gri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-11: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma kha bub tu 'gyel nas dran pa nyams te 'dar 'dar por byas nas bdag gis ci bgyis rang gi lag nas dug 'tshal ba lta zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-12: gom pa gnyis ni tshang na gsum pa byin cig ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-13: gsum pa ma mchis so zhes des smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-14: kho bos blang ba'ang blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-15: bdag gis thabs ji lta bu zhig bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-16: ngas gar bzhag pa der khyod kyis 'dug par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-17: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor mas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-18: bdag ni bka' ci stsal pa de bzhin du bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-24: des bden pa'i zhags pas bcings nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas de'ang bshig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-25: snod de dag kyang lhag ma can du bgyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337a-26: bu mo gzhon nu de dag kyang pan da pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-0: ko'u @337b rab dag gis mnol bar bgyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-1: seng ge'i khri de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-3: lham rin po ches brgyan pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-4: gos dang rgyan de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-5: gser gyi dpung rgyan rin po ches spras pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-6: glang ser skya de dag kyang pan da pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-7: ko'u ra ba de dag gis 'tshal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-8: bdag gi sa gzhi de dag kyang bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-9: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma lus la sems shing gtor ma ni mchod sbyin rgya cher bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-10: thabs ma 'tshal bas dus ma lags pas sbyin pa byin pas bcings pa nyid thob par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-11: lha la phyag 'tshal lo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-12: de khrid nas byed pa po bzhin du slas dang 'khor dang bcas te sa'i 'og tu bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-13: bdag gis sngon zhing ngan pa la sbyin pa bgyis so zhes gsol ba lags te; phyag na me tog padma bzang po thogs pas skyabs mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa dbu na bzhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-17: sems can mang po dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-18: dman pa dang phongs pa la thugs rje ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-19: gdugs bzhin du spyan bzang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-22: sems can shin tu dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:337b-26: nor bu yid bzhin dang 'dra ba chos kyi mdzod yongs su skyong bar mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-1: rol tu phyin pa drug ston par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-2: bsam pa legs par mdzad pa la bdag gis bstod pa 'di bgyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-3: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa'i sems can de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-4: thig nag po can dang 'o dod 'bod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-5: sems can dmyal bar skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-6: yi dvags kyi grong khyer du skyes pa gang dag khyod kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa de dag ni ngan song gi sdug bsngal chen po las thar ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-7: gang khyod kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa'i sems can de dag ni bsam pa legs pa dang ldan pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-8: de dag ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su mchis nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas las chos nyan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma la lung bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-10: khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-11: rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338a-13: bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul pa'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-0: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin gyi @338b dbang po'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-1: lha ma yin thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-2: khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dod chags kyi sgra med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-4: gti mug gi sgra med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-5: yi ge drug pa'i rig pa chen po 'thob pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-6: des de la chos kyi sbyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-7: mu tig gi se mo do 'dom stong pa rin brgya stong ri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-8: cod pan ran po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po chos 'chad par rtsom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-10: rgyal po chen po nyon cig mi mi rtag pa'i nang na gang rtag tu yongs su len par sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-11: longs spyod chen po'i rjes su sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-18: bang ba rin po che dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-23: ma la sems pa'i sems can de dag ni mi shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-24: gang dngos po de dag la chags pa'i sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bur snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-25: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang skyabs byed pa su'ang med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-26: gang gi tshe na srog dang bral ba de'i tshe dzambu'i gling la log par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-27: chu bo chen po la'ang khrag dang rnag gis gang bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:338b-28: gang shing chen po de dag kyang 'bar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-2: yang dag par shin tu 'bar bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-3: mthong nas kyang skrag par 'gyur zhing de nas gzhan gyis zhags pas bcings te khrid par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-4: spu gri'i so'i lam chen por rkang pa'ang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-5: rkang pa bteg pa dang rkang pa gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-9: khyi du ma dag gis kyang zos shing sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-10: de nas spu gri'i so'i lam chen po las babs nas rkang pa re re la'ang tsher ma sor bcu drug tsam yod pa lnga brgya lnga brgya zug par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-11: bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas zhes 'khod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-12: de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag 'di skad ces zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-13: grogs po khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms ma phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-14: khyed kyis gandi rdung ba'ang ma thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-15: khyod kyis sa phyogs gang du'ang mchod rten gyi gzugs ma bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-17: bdag cag ni ma dad pa sdig pa can sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-19: dge 'dun gyis spangs par gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-21: las de'i 'bras bu 'di myong bar gyis shig ces de dag gshin rje'i skyong bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339a-22: gshin rje'i rgyal po'i drung du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-1: de nas gshin rje'i rgyal pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-2: khyed deng la las kyi sa 'di ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-3: de nas gshin rje skyong ba'i skyes bu de dag gis de rnams khrid nas thig nag po can gyi sems can dmyal ba chen por bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-4: bcug nas lus la mtshon shakti brgyas btab kyang mi 'chi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-5: lus la mtshon shakti brgya pa gnyis pas btab kyang mi 'chi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-6: lus la mtshon shakti brgya pa gsum pas btab kyang mi 'chi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-7: gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus mi byed pa de'i tshe me'i 'obs su 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-8: 'on kyang 'chi ba'i dus mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-9: de dag kha bye nas lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-16: gzhang dag kyang sgra 'ur 'ur zer zhing lus thams cad kyang tshig par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-19: 'jig rten gzhan na skyabs byed pa su'ang med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-21: da nan tan du bsod nams gyis shig ces de ltar mthun pa'i chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-24: de ring dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'dir phal cher 'du bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:339b-25: nga ni 'gro'o zhes de skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos @340a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-1: 'od zer kha dog sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-6: dngul gyi kha dog rnam pa du ma btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-7: de dag song ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob pa'i spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi nang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-14: nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sten las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-16: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzer nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha pa sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-17: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-18: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'di lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma'i khang pa na gnas te de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-26: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po blta ba'i thabs gang zhig mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-2: gang gi che byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po lha ma yin gtor ma'i gnas nas byung ba de'i tshe dzi ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du lha'i me tog dag lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-3: lha'i shing dpag bsam shin tu mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-4: rgyan brgya stong du mas dbyangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-5: mu tig gi se mo do brgya stong du ma dbyangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-6: yul ka shi ka'i gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-8: phreng ba'i chun po rab tu dbyangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-10: lo ma ni gser dang dngul las byas pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-11: byu ru'i shing du ma dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-12: me tog gi shing du ma dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-13: rdzing bu me tog gis yongs su gang ba brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-16: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mi mchi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-18: de ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma'i khang pa nas byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-19: mi mi rgyu ba'i sa phyogs mun pa mun nag ces bya ba'i sar 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-21: de na nyi ma dang zla ba mi snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-22: nor bu yid bzhin rin po che dam pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba de snang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-23: gling de na gnod sbyin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:340b-24: srin po brgya stong du ma dag gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po song ba de'i tshe de dag dga' mgu zhing snying rab tu dga' bar gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i mdun du rgyug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-3: brgyugs nas kyang rkang pa la phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-6: khyod ni yun ring mo zhig nas mun pa mun nag gis 'dir gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-8: des kyang ngas sems can du ma yongs su smin par byas so zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-9: gnod sbyin dang srin po de dag gis de khrid nas lha'i gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-10: rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-11: ngal bsos nas gnod sbyin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-12: srin po de dag la chos 'chad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-13: khyed cag nyon cig ;gang theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po 'phags pa za ma tog bkod pa 'di'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-15: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-16: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po la bskul bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-20: rdul phra rab kyi tshad ni ngas bzung nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341a-22: theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bgrang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-1: rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po ni ngas thigs pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-3: theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma phrag brgya bcu gnyis snyed gnas gcig tu bskal pa bcu gnyis su na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-10: na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-11: yo byad kyis bkur sti byas pa de dag gis kyang de ltar mi nus na nga gcig pu mun pa mun nag gi nang du 'dug pas lta ci smos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-15: gling chen po bzhir khyim re re zhing yang lha'i gser dang rin po che'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-16: gtsug lag khang der mchod rten stong byas la nyin gcig tu de dag gi nang du ring bsrel bcug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-17: gang de dag tu ring bsrel bcug pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bas theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:341b-20: chu bo chen po lnga rgya mtsho mching rnam chen por 'bab pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-0: theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod @342a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-1: pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'ang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la gnod sbyin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-3: srin po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-4: sems can gang dag theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'di 'dri ba de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-6: de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-7: gang theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'drir 'jug pa de dag ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-11: gzugs kyi yan lag mchog dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-12: pha rol gyi sde 'joms par byed pa stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-13: gang theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa rtag tu 'dzin cing ming gi rjes su dran par byed pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342a-22: 'khrug pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-0: gang la lar[?] @342b skye ba de dang de dag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-1: de dag gi lus la ba lang gi spos kyi tsandan snam par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-2: kha nas me tog autpa la sngon po'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-3: lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-4: stobs po che'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar de dag la mthun pa'i chos bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-6: srin po de dag las kha cig ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-7: kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-9: gtsug lag khang 'di nyid na bzhugs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-10: gnas gzhan gang du'ang ma bzhud cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-11: mun pa mun nag gis 'di nyid du bdag cag gis lha'i gser gyi mchod rten bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-14: ngas sems can du ma dag byang chub kyi lam la dgod dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-15: de nas gnod sbyin dang srin po de dag lag pa la 'gram pa brten te sems shing 'khod nas gcig la gcig 'di skad smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-16: bdag cag gi spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gshegs par 'gyur bas chos kyi gtam spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:342b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-1: dag kyang phyi bzhin du 'brang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-2: khyed shin tu ring du 'ongs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-4: de nas gnod sbyin dang srin po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa la phyag btsal te de nyid nas slar log go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-5: de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po me'i phung po 'bar ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-6: de nas bram ze'i gzugs su sprul te gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag gi drung du song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-7: lha'i ris de na lha'i bu rna cha'i mchog ces bya ba dbul po sdug bsngal ba zhig 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-8: de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bram ze de'i gzugs kyis lha'i bu de'i drung du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-9: phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-12: de nas lha'i bu des bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-14: bdag la ni cung zad kyang ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-15: bdag la cung zad cig ni nges par stsal 'tshal lo; ;de nas lha'i bu gzhal med khang du song ste snod dag bltas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343a-16: snod rnams lha'i nor bu rin po che rin thang med pas yongs su gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-0: snod gzhan @343b dag kyang ro'i ro mchog gi zas dag gis yongs su gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-1: g-yon phyogs kyi gzhal med khang na yang gos dang rgyan gyis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-2: de nas lha'i bu de sems par gyur nas 'di 'dra ba'i dpal thob pa las na bdag gi sgo na nges par snod bzang po zhig 'dug go snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-3: de nas des bram ze de bos te gzhal med khang gi nang du song nas lha'i rin po ches kyang bstabs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-4: lha'i ro'i ro mchog gi zas kyang byin te zos nas bkra shis pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-5: de nas lha'i bu des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-6: bram ze chen po khyod sa ga las 'ongs bdag ni jo ta'i tshal zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang nas mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-7: de nas lha'i bu des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-8: sa de ji lta bu zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-9: de nas bram ze des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-10: sa de ni dga' bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-11: lha'i nor bu rin po ches yongs su brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-12: lha'i shing dpag bsam gyis yongs su mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-13: me tog yid du 'ong ba dag byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-14: rdzing bu rnam pa du ma gda' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-15: tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa'i sbyin gnas sna tshogs dag gda' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob kyi cho 'phrul dag gda' ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-18: sa de ni de ltar dga' bar bgyid pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:343b-19: de nas lha'i bu des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-0: bram ze khyod kyis nges par bden @344a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-4: mi la ni ji ltar khyod la ltas snang ba de 'dra ba'i ltas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-5: de nas des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-9: brel ba la thugs rje bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-10: byang chub kyi lam ston par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-12: de nas lha'i bus cod pan dang rna cha phul nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-13: kye ma'o yon tan dag gi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-14: nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-15: de ring nyid du sa bon btab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-16: de ring nyid du 'bras bu grub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-17: de nas lha'i bu des tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas de nyid du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-18: de nas bram ze chen po de lha'i ris de nas babs te singgha la'i gling du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-19: song nas 'dod pa'i gzugs su sprul te srin mo rnams kyi mdun du 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-20: gzugs bzang po mthong nas de'i tshe 'dod pa'i sems skyes so; ;gang gi tshe na 'dod pa'i sems skyes pa de'i tshe de'i drung du song ste phyin nas bdag cag dang bsten cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-21: bdag cag ni bud med gzhon nu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-22: bdag cag la ni khyim thabs ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-23: bdag po ma mchis pa'i ni bdag por gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-24: mgon ma mchis pa'i ni mgon du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344a-25: rten ma mchis pa'i ni rten du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-0: 'di @344b khyod kyis zas kyi khab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-2: skyed mos tshal dga' bar bgyid pa dag lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-3: rdzing bu dga' bar bgyid pa dag lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-5: gal te bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byed na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-7: des de dag la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i lam yang bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-8: zhal nas gsungs pa bzhi'ang kha ton byed du bcug nas lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-9: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang thob nas srin mo de dag la 'dod chags kyi sdug bsngal mi ldang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-10: sems zhe sdang bar yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-11: su la'ang srog gi bar chad byed par mi 'dod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-12: chos la mngon par dga' zhing gnas la sdom pa blangs te slan chad bdag cag srog gcod par mi bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-13: dzambu'i gling gi mi dag ji ltar zas dang skom gyis 'tsho ba bdag cag kyang de bzhin du 'tsho'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-14: slan chad srin mo'i tshul du mi bgyid do zhes de 'dra ba'i bslab tshig gi sdom pa blangs te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:344b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po singgha la'i gling nas byung nas yul 'khor mor 'jig gi grong khyer chen po na bshang ba dang gci ba'i gnas de na srin bu'i rigs brgya stong du ma gnas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-0: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang @345a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-1: po bung ba'i gzugs su sprul nas sgra bung bung du phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-2: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-3: de dag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la rjes su dran nas 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-4: de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kha na spos kyi dri zhes bya bar gyur te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-5: de'i tshe sems can yongs su smin par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-6: 'khor mor 'jig gi grong khyer chen po nas song nas yul ma ga dh'ara mngon du phyogs te song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-7: yul ma ga dh'ar phyin nas lo nyi shur dgon pa na gnas pa'i sems can gcig la gcig sha za ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bdag gis thabs gang gis sems can 'di dag tshim par bya snyam du sems par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lha'i char pa dbab par brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-10: thog mar ni chu'i char ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345a-11: gang gi tshe na chus ngoms[?] par gyur pa de'i 'og tu lha'i zhal zas ro mchog dang ldan pas ston pa yongs su gang ba dag bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-0: gang gi tshe na zas kyis yongs su tshim par gyur pa de'i tshe 'bras kyi @345b char bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-5: gang dang gang gi tshe na sems can de dag gi dgos pa sems par gyur pa de'i tshe de dag gi bsam pa grub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-6: de nas yul ma ga dh'a'i sems can de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas de thams cad gnas gcig tu ngal bsos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-7: ngal bsos nas gcig la gcig 'di lha gang gi mthu zhig ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-8: de nas skyes bu de dag gi nang na rnyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-12: ba lang gi sna ltar gug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-13: lo brgya stong du ma lon pa zhig yod pa des de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ma gtogs par lha gzhan gang gi'ang mthu 'di 'dra bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-15: de nas 'khor de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i mtshan ma ji lta bu zhes dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-16: de nas skyes bu des yon tan bshad par brtsams pa mun par gyur pa rnams kyi ni sgron mar gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-17: nyi mas gdungs shing tshig pa rnams kyi ni gdugs su gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-18: skom gyis gdungs pa rnams kyi ni chu bor gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-19: 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa rnams la ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:345b-20: nad kyis btab pa rnams la ni sman par gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-0: sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi ni pha dang mar gyur @346a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-1: pa'o; ;sems can bstir med par skyes pa rnams la ni mya ngan las 'das pa ston par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-2: de'i yon tan gyi khyad par ni 'di lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-3: gang de'i mtshan gyi rjes su dran pa de dag ni 'jig rten na bde ba dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-4: de dag ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tha ma yongs su spong ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-5: gang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la rtag tu me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-6: pog bsdus shing 'bul ba'i skyes bu gang zag de dag ni sems dpa' ba dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-7: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi byed pa de dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-11: bal glang rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-12: nor bu rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-13: bud med rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-14: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-15: blon po rin po che dang bdun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-16: rin po che de bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-17: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la me tog 'bul ba de dag ni lus dri zhim zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346a-18: gang la lar skyes pa lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes skyes bu des de ltar yon tan gyi khyad par bshad nas 'khor de dag bdag bdag gi khang par dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-0: de nas skyes bu rnyis[?] @346b pa des mthun pa'i chos bshad nas de'ang bdag gi khang par song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de nyid du nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-2: de nas de nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob ma mthong nas yun ring ngo snyam du bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-3: de mthar gyis dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-4: 'ong ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du phyin nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-13: mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang; byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma dag tshogs pa'ang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-16: byang chub sems dpa' de gang zhig mchi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:346b-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-0: lan gsum bskor nas g-yon phyogs @347a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ngal lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-4: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis las kyis ji lta bu zhig bsgrubs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-5: des sngon ji ltar gyur pa gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-7: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i yul 'di lta bu ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dag la'ang yul 'di lta bu ma mchis na byang chub sems dpar gyur pa la lta ci smos snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-11: 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-15: nyon ma mongs so zhes phan tshun du gtam byas nas kha rog ste 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bshad par brtsams pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-17: rigs kyi bu dag nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-18: byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-19: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347a-20: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-0: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @347b phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-1: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-3: zhes chos de bshad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-4: de nas 'khor de dag bdag bdag gi gnas su dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bdag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-6: 'di ni theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i le'u dang po ste rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos sngon ting nge 'dzin gang dag la mnyam par bzhag par gyur pa bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-13: rnam par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-14: 'od byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-15: rdo gyen du 'phags zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-16: nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-17: 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-18: dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-19: rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-20: rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:347b-21: bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-0: phyogs bcur rnam par lta zhes @348a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-2: yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu spyan mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-3: chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-4: shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-5: dga' ba sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-6: rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-8: ma lus par 'ongs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-9: mngon par 'dud ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-10: spyi bor 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-11: zla ba ltar spyan mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-12: g-yog skye bo mang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-13: lha'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-14: bskal pa'i gling zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-15: cho 'phrul ston ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-16: padma'i bla zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-17: rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-18: bstir med pa skems zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-19: 'bar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-20: lha'i rna cha zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-21: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-22: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348a-23: rgya mtshor 'jug ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348b-0: @348b gzhal med khang gi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-053-004:348b-1: bya ka la pingka'i sgra zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
